title: Draft letter from Walt Whitman to Unknown Correspondent, Undated
text: Sir:whether agreeingit agrees with your own opinions or not I hope you will open your columns to mythis communication sent herewith of mine, seeking to stir up the government to a general exchange of prisoners. I hope also you willcouldmay feel to say a word calling a about it editorially,â€”if you could call attention to it.As I have sent similar communications this afternoon to one or two other papers, I would particularly solicit that you find room for it in to-morrow's paper issue. Draft letter from Walt Whitman to Unknown Correspondent, Undated
